text: N’iyo ubabajije uti “Ni nde waremye ibirere n’isi”? Rwose baravuga bati “Ni Allah.” Vuga uti “Murabona ibyo musenga bitari Allah, Allah aramutse ashaka ko icyago kimbaho byagikuraho? Cyangwa agashaka ko impuhwe zingeraho, byakumira impuhwe ze”? Vuga uti “Allah arampagije kandi abiringira bajye baba ari We biringira.”
